languages.text: "Е{mf|го|е} светлость, приблизив к себе на церемонии члена {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g}, показал{mf||а}, что намерен{mf||а} строго чтить Кредо {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, а значит — искоренять ксенозаразу! И дом Зауэрбэк поддержит е{mf|го|е} в этом праведном стремлении всеми силами!"

"By having a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} by your side at the ceremony, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has shown your intent to closely abide by the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s credo — to root out the xenoscourge! And House Sauerback will offer every support to you in this righteous undertaking!"
languages.original_text: "Е{mf|го|е} светлость, приблизив к себе на церемонии члена {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g}, показал{mf||а}, что намерен{mf||а} строго чтить Кредо {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, а значит — искоренять ксенозаразу! И дом Зауэрбэк поддержит е{mf|го|е} в этом праведном стремлении всеми силами!"

And House Sauerback will offer every support to you in this righteous undertaking!"

"By having a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} by your side at the ceremony, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has shown your intent to closely abide by the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium's{/g} credo — to root out the xenoscourge! And House Sauerback will offer every support to you in this righteous undertaking!"

"By having a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} by your side at the ceremony, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has shown your intent to closely abide by the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s credo — to root out the xenoscourge! And House Sauerback will offer every support to you in this righteous undertaking!"

languages.text: 「式典で{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}の人員をお連れになっているのも、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の信条を固く守るという陛下のご意志の現れでしょう…異種族による惨劇を根絶すると！ザウアーバック家はこの正義を執行するためにあらゆる支援をいたします！」
languages.original_text: "By having a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} by your side at the ceremony, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has shown your intent to closely abide by the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s credo — to root out the xenoscourge! And House Sauerback will offer every support to you in this righteous undertaking!"

traits.locale_text: 「式典で{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}の人員をお連れになっているのも、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の信条を固く守るという陛下のご意志の現れでしょう…異種族による惨劇を根絶すると！ザウアーバック家はこの正義を執行するためにあらゆる支援をいたします！」

languages.text: “您允许{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}的成员参加仪式，这表明大人您打算严格遵守{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的信条，消灭所有的异形祸害！苏尔贝克家族将全力支持您的正义事业！”
languages.original_text: "By having a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} by your side at the ceremony, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has shown your intent to closely abide by the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s credo — to root out the xenoscourge! And House Sauerback will offer every support to you in this righteous undertaking!"

traits.locale_text: “您允许{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}的成员参加仪式，这表明大人您打算严格遵守{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的信条，消灭所有的异形祸害！苏尔贝克家族将全力支持您的正义事业！”

languages.text: «Al tener a un representante de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g} a su lado durante la ceremonia, mi{mf|lord|lady} demuestra su intención de seguir el credo del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} firmemente: ¡extirpar el azote xenos! ¡La casa Sauerback hará todo lo posible para ayudarle en tan justo cometido!».
languages.original_text: "By having a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} by your side at the ceremony, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has shown your intent to closely abide by the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s credo — to root out the xenoscourge! And House Sauerback will offer every support to you in this righteous undertaking!"

traits.locale_text: «Al tener a un representante de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g} a su lado durante la ceremonia, mi{mf|lord|lady} demuestra su intención de seguir el credo del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} firmemente: ¡extirpar el azote xenos! ¡La casa Sauerback hará todo lo posible para ayudarle en tan justo cometido!».

languages.text: « En invitant un membre de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} à se tenir à vos côtés pendant la cérémonie, Votre Seigneurie a affirmé son intention de suivre scrupuleusement le crédo de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} : anéantir le fléau xénos ! Et la maison Sauerback vous apportera tout son soutien dans cette entreprise ! »
languages.original_text: "By having a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} by your side at the ceremony, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has shown your intent to closely abide by the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s credo — to root out the xenoscourge! And House Sauerback will offer every support to you in this righteous undertaking!"

traits.locale_text: « En invitant un membre de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} à se tenir à vos côtés pendant la cérémonie, Votre Seigneurie a affirmé son intention de suivre scrupuleusement le crédo de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} : anéantir le fléau xénos ! Et la maison Sauerback vous apportera tout son soutien dans cette entreprise ! »

languages.text: "Durch die Anwesenheit eines Mitglieds der {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} bei der Zeremonie hat Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} die Absicht demonstriert, dem Credo des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} genau zu folgen – und die Xenoplage auszurotten! Und das Haus Sauerback wird Euch bei diesem rechtschaffenen Unterfangen nach Möglichkeit unterstützen!"
languages.original_text: "By having a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} by your side at the ceremony, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has shown your intent to closely abide by the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s credo — to root out the xenoscourge! And House Sauerback will offer every support to you in this righteous undertaking!"

traits.locale_text: "Durch die Anwesenheit eines Mitglieds der {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} bei der Zeremonie hat Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} die Absicht demonstriert, dem Credo des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} genau zu folgen – und die Xenoplage auszurotten! Und das Haus Sauerback wird Euch bei diesem rechtschaffenen Unterfangen nach Möglichkeit unterstützen!"

languages.text: "Törende yanınızda bir {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon{/g} mensubuna yer verdiniz. Böylece {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} zeno felaketinin kökünü kurutmaya yönelik imanına sıkıca riayet etmeye niyetli olduğunuzu göstermiş oldunuz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Sauerback Hanesi de bu erdemli davanızda size her türlü desteği sunmaktan çekinmeyecektir!"
languages.original_text: "By having a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} by your side at the ceremony, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has shown your intent to closely abide by the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s credo — to root out the xenoscourge! And House Sauerback will offer every support to you in this righteous undertaking!"

traits.locale_text: "Törende yanınızda bir {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon{/g} üyesinin olmasıyla, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un zeno felaketinin kökünü kurutmaya yönelik imanına sıkıca riayet etmeye niyetli olduğunuzu göstermiş oldunuz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Sauerback Hanesi de, bu erdemli davanızda size her türlü desteği sunmaktan çekinmeyecektir!"
